feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
